title: Senior SEO Specialist
job_overview:
Senior SEO Specialist

Company:
We are a dynamic marketing agency serving primarily North American clients with a strong focus on digital marketing strategies. Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional results and exceeding client expectations through innovative solutions.

Position Overview:
We are seeking a Senior SEO Specialist who specializes in Search Engine Optimization (SEO) to join our team on a project-to-project or part-time basis. As an SEO Expert, you will collaborate closely with our team to enhance our clients' online presence and drive organic traffic to their websites.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct keyword research and analysis to guide content creation and optimization strategies.
- Perform on-page SEO optimizations including meta tags, headers, internal linking, etc.
- Execute off-page SEO activities such as link building, directory submissions, and outreach.
- Monitor and report on SEO performance metrics using tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, or similar platforms.
- Stay updated with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role with a strong portfolio of successful SEO projects.
- Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Ahrefs, Moz, etc.
- Solid understanding of on-page and off-page SEO techniques.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
- Ability to work independently and remotely with minimal supervision.
- Detail-oriented and analytical mindset with a proactive approach to problem-solving.
- Experience working with North American clients is a plus.

Schedule:
- Flexible hours depending on project requirements and deadlines.

Benefits:
- Competitive compensation based on experience and project scope.
- Opportunity to work with diverse clients and industries.
- Professional growth and development in the field of digital marketing.
- Flexible work schedule and remote working environment.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send a message with their resume and portfolio showcasing relevant SEO projects.
